FuncDef:
The evpn srv6 next-header-field command sets the type value in the SRH to 143 or 59.
The undo evpn srv6 next-header-field command restores the default type value in the SRH.
By default, EVPN Segment Routing IPv6 next header type field is 143.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type value in the SRH is 59.
-

Specifies the type value in the SRH is 143.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The Header Type field in SRv6 SRH was changed. To be compatible with the Header Type field in source version, the value can be set to 59 in the target version.
